At the Bill of Rights Institute, we are proud to highlight our high-quality content  including stories of great courage throughout American history. To listen to the episode, visit https://lnkd.in/eWF_NZRh. #billofrightsinstitute #BRI

What if Americas 250th birthday became a unifying time for our nation? And could a renewed focus on our Founding principles help bring Americans together? These are some of the questions Bill of Rights Institute President and CEO David Bobb tackles in his newest op-ed, "America's 250th is worthy of celebration  and unity.   As America's 250th approaches, Bobb discusses how the event can be a time for our nation to reflect on its journey, and for Americans to find common ground. "Americas journey has not been perfect, but our end goal  the full realization of equality and liberty for all people  is perfect,  Bobb wrote, adding that, As we prepare for Americas 250th birthday, we can celebrate the Founding principles that established a framework for both our journey and our progress. To read more, visit https://lnkd.in/eYPTe9sq. #billofrightsinstitute #BRI #Foundingprinciples
